command.text: select "Form_HR_WorkersComp"."form_hr_workerscompid" "FormHrWorkerscompid" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."form_queueid" "FormQueueid" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."company_code" "CompanyCode" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."report_type" "ReportType" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."siteid" "Siteid" ,"siteid"."site_name" "SiteidSiteName" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."jobno" "Jobno" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."site_name" "SiteName" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."site_state" "SiteState" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."other_site_name" "OtherSiteName" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."incident_date" "IncidentDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."report_submitted_by" "ReportSubmittedBy" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."report_submitted_date" "ReportSubmittedDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."work_schedule_desc" "WorkScheduleDesc" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."employeeid" "Employeeid" ,"employeeid"."employeeid" "Employeeid" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."fileno" "Fileno" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."employee_name" "EmployeeName" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."first_name" "FirstName" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."last_name" "LastName" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."address1" "Address1" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."address2" "Address2" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."city" "City" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."state" "State" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."zipcode" "Zipcode" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."phone_home" "PhoneHome" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."phone_mobile" "PhoneMobile" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."emailaddress" "Emailaddress" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."federal_id" "FederalID" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."birthdate" "Birthdate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."employment_status" "EmploymentStatus" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."position" "Position" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."injury_date" "InjuryDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."injury_time" "InjuryTime" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."accident_cause_desc" "AccidentCauseDesc" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."injury_nature_desc" "InjuryNatureDesc" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."body_part_desc" "BodyPartDesc" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."body_side_desc" "BodySideDesc" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."work_starttime" "WorkStarttime" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."employer_notified_date" "EmployerNotifiedDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."lastworked_date" "LastworkedDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."hours_worked_per_day" "HoursWorkedPerDay" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."days_worked_per_week" "DaysWorkedPerWeek" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."expectedreturn_date" "ExpectedreturnDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."return_date" "ReturnDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."fatal_date" "FatalDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."isemployeelosingworktime" "Isemployeelosingworktime" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."disability_start_date" "DisabilityStartDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."ismodifiedduty" "Ismodifiedduty" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."modifiedduty_start_date" "ModifieddutyStartDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."hadSafeguards" "HadSafeguards" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."wereSafeguardsUsed" "WereSafeguardsUsed" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."isQuestionableClaim" "IsQuestionableClaim" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."wasinjured_during_employment" "WasinjuredDuringEmployment" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."witness_available" "WitnessAvailable" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."witness_name" "WitnessName" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."witness_phone" "WitnessPhone" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."medical_treatment_facility_name" "MedicalTreatmentFacilityName" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."medical_treatment_doctor_name" "MedicalTreatmentDoctorName" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."medical_treatment_refused" "MedicalTreatmentRefused" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."medical_treatment_doctors_notes_provided" "MedicalTreatmentDoctorsNotesProvided" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."temp_prescription_card_issued" "TempPrescriptionCardIssued" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."comment" "Comment" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."created_date" "CreatedDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."status" "Status" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."claim_id" "Claimid" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."start_work_time" "StartWorkTime" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."end_work_time" "EndWorkTime" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."sun_worked_day" "SunWorkedDay" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."mon_worked_day" "MonWorkedDay" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."tue_worked_day" "TueWorkedDay" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."wed_worked_day" "WedWorkedDay" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."thu_worked_day" "ThuWorkedDay" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."fri_worked_day" "FriWorkedDay" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."sat_worked_day" "SatWorkedDay" from "dbo"."Form_HR_WorkersComp" "Form_HR_WorkersComp" left join "dbo"."Site" "siteid" on "Form_HR_WorkersComp"."siteid" = "siteid"."siteid" left join "dbo"."Employee" "employeeid" on "Form_HR_WorkersComp"."employeeid" = "employeeid"."employeeid"
